isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION

svcproc.title: Auxiliary Circulation Fan W/PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: When the Auxiliary Circulation Fan is turned to high or low position, power flows from the B2 battery stud through circuit 14AK, 14AV, fuse F10 - B, and circuit 14AX to fuse 582 - B. From there power flows through circuit 76L and 76K to the fan switch, and fan motor. The ground path consists of circuit 76 - GK, 11 - GAC, 11 - GAD, 11 - GBD, and 11 - GBE to ground adapter (454).
